Name: Benefits detail page
Description: These pages hold all of the benefits overview content, such the detail pages linked to from va.gov/disability, va.gov/health-care, and va.gov/education.

Name: Benefits hub landing page
Description: A special page for top-level Benefits content with its own one-off layout and content.

Name: Detail Page
Description: For static pages where there's not another content type already available.

Name: Documentation page
Description: Help pages VA.gov CMS editors.

Name: Event
Description: For online or in-person events like support groups, outreach events, public lectures, and more.

Name: Event listing page
Description: A listing of events.

Name: Health services listing page
Description: A listing of health services.

Name: Leadership listing page
Description: A listing of staff members.

Name: Locations listing page
Description: A listing of locations.

Name: NCA facility
Description: A facility within National Cemetery Administration system.

Name: News release
Description: Announcements directed at members of the media for the purpose of publicizing newsworthy events/happenings/programs at specific facilities or healthcare systems.

Name: News release listing page
Description: A listing of news releases.

Name: Office
Description: An office at the VA, which may have contact info, events, news, and a leadership page in some cases.

Name: Publication
Description: Contains a document, image, or video, for publication within a Publication library.

Name: Publication listing page
Description: This allows the listing of publication materials such as documents, videos, and images all in one place.

Name: Staff profile
Description: Profiles of staff members for display in various places around the site.

Name: Story
Description: Community stories highlight the role of a VA facility, program, or healthcare system in a Veteran's journey. They may be a case study of a specific patient, a description of a new or successful program, or a community-interest story.

Name: Story listing page
Description: A listing of stories.

Name: Support Service
Description: Help desks, hotlines, etc, to be contextually placed alongside relevant content.

Name: VA form
Description: VA forms available for download. Used to populate search results and also generate form landing pages

Name: VAMC facility
Description: A clinic or hospital within a VAMC system.

Name: VAMC facility health service
Description: A facility specific description of a health care service, always embedded within a VAMC system description.

Name: VAMC system
Description: A VAMC system contains multiple VHA health facilities, including usually at least one VAMC, sometimes more.

Name: VAMC system banner alert with situation updates
Description: A full-width alert that will be added to a VAMC system, or multiple VAMC systems.

Name: VAMC system health service
Description: A description of a health service specific to a VAMC system.

Name: VAMC system operating status
Description: Create one of these pages for each VAMC system. Then you can add banner alerts and update facilities' operating status, all from one place.

Name: VBA facility
Description: A facility within Veterans Benefits Administration system.

Name: Vet Center
Description: A facility within Vet Centers system.

Name: Alert
Description: An alert box that can be added to individual pages.

Name: Promo
Description: Promote a link with an image, title, and description.

Name: Document
Description: A locally hosted document, such as a PDF.

Name: Image
Description: Locally hosted images.

Name: Video
Description: A video hosted by YouTube, Vimeo, or some other provider.

Name: Accordion group
Description: A group of accordions.

Name: Accordion Item
Description: An individual accordion.

Name: Additional information
Description: Spanish summary to include a brief spanish-language summary of the content.

Name: Address
Description: An address block.

Name: Alert
Description: A reusable or non-reusable alert, either "information status" or "warning status".

Name: Embedded image
Description: For adding an image inline

Name: Expandable Text
Description: Text that expands upon click.

Name: Link teaser
Description: A link followed by a description. For building inline "menus" of content.

Name: Link to file or video
Description: For image or document downloads.

Name: List of link teasers
Description: A paragraph that contains only one type of paragraph: Link teaser.

Name: Number callout
Description: Number callouts can be used in the context of a question & answer, where the answer can be summarized in a short phrase that is number-oriented.

Name: Process list
Description: An ordered list (1, 2, 3, 4, N) of steps in a process.

Name: Q&A
Description: Question and Answer

Name: Q&A Section
Description: For content formatted as a series of questions and answers. Use this (instead of WYSIWYG) for better accessibility and easy rearranging.

Name: React Widget
Description: Advanced editors can use this to place react widgets (like a form) on the page.

Name: Situation update
Description: A time-sensitive, added to a banner alert, and displayed on VAMC operating status pages.

Name: Staff profile
Description: Add a profile of a staff person.

Name: Starred Horizontal Rule
Description: Current an inactive paragraph type, not enabled within any fields.

Name: Table
Description: Add an HTML table with rows and columns.

Name: VAMC facility service (non-healthcare service)
Description: A service available at a specific health care facility, like Parking, or Chaplaincy.

Name: WYSIWYG
Description: An open-ended text field.

Name: Sections
Description: Represents a hierarchy of the VA, partly for governance purposes.

Name: VHA health service taxonomy
Description: Single source of truth for health service names, descriptions, patient-friendly names, and common conditions.
